name: @zefiros/axioms
description: Library with axioms for writing Typescript/Javascript

scripts.package: rm -r dist && yarn build && find dist -type f -regex '.*.js.map' -exec sed -i.bak 's|../src|./src|g' {} \; && find dist -type f -regex '.*.bak' -exec rm {} \; && cp -r package.json LICENSE CHANGELOG.md README.md src dist/
